Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_ATRACK_OUTER_LABEL' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_ATRACK_OUTER_LABEL] GO CREATE VIEW [dbo].[v_ATRACK_OUTER_LABEL] AS SELECT SOShipment.CompanyID, NumberPool.NowNbr + 1 as 'GroupNowNbr', SOPackageDetail.UsrShipmentSplitLineNbr as 'UsrShipmentSplitLineNbr', CONVERT(INT, NumberPool.NowNbr + 1 + CEILING((SUM(SOPackageDetail.Qty) / CSAnswers_INBOX.Value))) as 'NowNbr', SOShipment.ShipmentNbr, SOShipment.ShipDate, SOLine.AlternateID, SOOrder.CustomerOrderNbr, SOPackageDetail.UsrDateCode, CSAnswers_CARTON.Value AS 'Attributes_CARTON_Value', CSAnswers_INBOX.Value AS 'Attributes_INBOX_Value', InventoryItem.Descr AS 'InventoryItemDescr', InventoryItem.InventoryCD, InventoryItem.InventoryID, SUM(SOPackageDetail.Qty) AS 'sumQty' FROM SOShipment LEFT JOIN SOPackageDetail ON SOPackageDetail.ShipmentNbr = SOShipment.ShipmentNbr and SOPackageDetail.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT JOIN SOShipLine ON SOShipLine.ShipmentNbr = SOPackageDetail.ShipmentNbr and SOShipLine.LineNbr = SOPackageDetail.UsrShipmentSplitLineNbr and SOShipLine.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT JOIN SOOrder ON SOShipLine.OrigOrderNbr = SOOrder.OrderNbr and SOShipLine.OrigOrderType = SOOrder.OrderType and SOOrder.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT JOIN InventoryItem ON SOShipLine.InventoryID = InventoryItem.InventoryID and InventoryItem.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT JOIN SOLine ON SOShipLine.OrigOrderNbr = SOLine.OrderNbr and SOShipLine.OrigOrderType = SOLine.OrderType and SOShipLine.OrigLineNbr = SOLine.LineNbr and SOLine.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT JOIN CSAttribute ON CSAttribute.AttributeID = 'MADEIN' and CSAttribute.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT OUTER JOIN CSAnswers as CSAnswers_INBOX ON CSAnswers_INBOX.RefNoteID = InventoryItem.NoteID and CSAnswers_INBOX.AttributeID = 'QTYINBOX' and CSAnswers_INBOX.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID LEFT OUTER JOIN CSAnswers as CSAnswers_CARTON ON CSAnswers_CARTON.RefNoteID = InventoryItem.NoteID and CSAnswers_CARTON.AttributeID = 'QTYCARTON' and CSAnswers_CARTON.CompanyID = SOShipment.CompanyID CROSS JOIN( SELECT DISTINCT NUMBER AS NowNbr FROM master.dbo.spt_values WHERE name IS NULL ) NumberPool GROUP BY SOShipment.CompanyID, NumberPool.NowNbr, SOPackageDetail.UsrShipmentSplitLineNbr, SOShipment.ShipmentNbr, SOShipment.ShipDate, SOLine.AlternateID, SOOrder.CustomerOrderNbr, SOPackageDetail.UsrDateCode, CSAnswers_CARTON.Value, CSAnswers_INBOX.Value, InventoryItem.Descr, InventoryItem.InventoryCD, InventoryItem.InventoryID HAVING NumberPool.NowNbr < (SUM(SOPackageDetail.Qty) / CSAnswers_CARTON.Value)
